column5: Both originated from Finland so I guess it's a good combination.
Got an email about these today.  They do kind of look cool  http://rapala.ca/angry-birds-products
Hahaha oh my. That popper and the black wake bait look decent
I got that email too
Well  they are supposed to be on sale at CTC, but if you check stock in any of the stores in Ontario, they don't have them.  Premature email
Cool. My boy would like one.
If I dont get one for my grandson,I,ll be on the crap list. LOL  Then again,if I do,oh poppy.LOL
I'll bet they catch all kinds of fishermen
LOL, cool! The one on the header would be a daredevil and the red and yellow is just a 5 O' diamonds so I'm sure they work well
I'll bet they catch all kinds of fishermen Too True Lew!
I don't have any little ones to buy for at the moment  . At least not for another 2 years
Ha Ha they sure know how to squeeze every cent out of the Angry Birds brand!
The marketing guy at rapala should be fired for being 5 years too late with the angry bird thing.  Now if it was an adventure time lure, well, now were talkin...
People are actually going out of their way to buy advertisements now. Hmm.
Been happening for decades already.
I think the Rattlin' red bird would work, If always had good luck with those colour lures.
So where is the Duck Dynasty fishing lures ? I'm up for a Uncle Si chugger bug.    Art
You Canadians get all the good stuff

Super Secret Insider Pro Tip (well maybe not that secret or pro): If your local CT has the key chains and you have the proper/appropriately sized trebles and split rings, buy the key chains. I bought 2 of em tonight for $5.99 each and stuck hooks on em and tub tested them. They ran perfectly fine. Plus the European Rapala website states that they "are an exact copy of the lures, just without the hooks." Much cheaper than what the website had the lures at ($12.99 or $13.99, can't remember, couldn't find them there recently)

The marketing guy at rapala should be fired for being 5 years too late with the angry bird thing.  Now if it was an adventure time lure, well, now were talkin...  What other tackle company jumped on this?  They will sell like hotcakes, you just wait.
I'll bet they catch all kinds of fishermen  I bet they catch some fish too!
Got the red lipless crank in my stocking from my girlfriend...  not going to lie, I am actually pretty pumped to use this come soft water
Fish are stupid, they'll bite pretty much anything.  Colours are good, no reason why you wouldn't catch fish on them.
I got a red one for Christmas from my daughter - I am going to use it on some back lakes this spring.  WR
they only gonna work on pig fat like fish

I looked at  CDN Tire to buy them for my grandsons for Xmas, but crappy tire never rec'd them or anywhere close to Kingston.  I showed the website to the boys and they thought they were cool and would like to try them.  They're listed at $15.00 AND from the website NOT avaiable in North America, available in Estonia,and some other countries in Europe and Asia.  Will look again at the Sportsman Show in feb.
